## Source: amazon-inspector (d3ce97e3af4cf9c82b0a51f4b693273ac59c6b1357b445b5613fbdcf7edec9a9)
The package vet-bones was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5e43daf02ec71ecb920ea363bf289d09826825676ccae0f97302a26f16289105)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vet-bones' @ 99.99.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
